refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the number of warnings from the last query for the given link

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: mysqli_warning_count returns the number of warnings from the last query in the connection represented by the link parameter.

note.para: For retrieving warning messages you can use the SQL command SHOW WARNINGS [limit row_count].

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
Number of warnings or zero if there are no warnings.
